channel.title: [RE-POST]Bloody4Scape Client[RE-POST]
channel.description:
~~Welcome to Bloody4Scape Client~~ ------------Invalid-------------
~~Optimizing~~ ==== Programs and Files Necessary ==== -- Downloadable Silab Client -- Hamachi -- Java SoftWare (v6 or Higher for best performance)
~~Features~~ ====Commands==== ```Player Commands```
-::yell -::jad -::pk -::pkbox -::funpk -::pktools -::clanwars -::skillz -::starter -::thieve -::edge -::switch -::octagon -::home -::3rdage -::mystats -::anti -::runesnfood -::wc -::afk -::cart -::back -::dungeon -::train -::shops (silab download required) -::fish -::edge
```Moderator Commands``` -::pkarm -::tb -::barrage -::modwear -::toy -::rich -::skiller -::kick (name) -::banuser (name) -::st4ff -::master -::pure
```Administrator Commands``` -::xteletome (user) -::xteleto (user) -::adminwear -::ipban (name) -::ipmute -::pickup (id) (amount) -::npc (id) -::checkip
```Co-Owner\Owner Commands``` -::xteleall -::ownerwear -::ownerpkwear -::emote (id) -::alert (message)
~~Pictures~~ [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler12.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler14.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler6.jpg[/img]
~~Getting Silab Download~~ ====Links==== -Uppit http://uppit.com/UQ7EDV -MegaUpLoad http://www.megaupload.com/?d=HTIQ24UI -RapidShare http://rapidshare.com/files/167675803/Silab.bat.html -Miss SilabSoft's Upload http://w13.easy-share.com/1700400917.html (best link) -Miss SilabSoft's Item List http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/output.txt
====Instructions On DownLoading Silab Client==== 1. First Download Win.Rar. www.download.com/WinRAR/3000-2250_4-10007677.html 2. Choose a Link 3.Select Download 4.Select Open 5.Highlight the 'Silab' and 'Silab Client' 6.Select the button on the top which says "Extract All" 7.Press on the Arrow and Select "Documents" 8.Press OK at the bottom and wait 9.Go to "Documents" on your Computer and press the .bat file called "Silab" 10.Wait for it to load and download cache 11.Your done =]
====Instructions on Getting onto Bloody4Scape Server==== 1.Download Hamachi https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/list.asp 2.After Downloaded open it up 3.Click on the 'Triangle" looking thing at the bottom right corner 4.Select "Join NetWork" 5.For the NetWork name type in Bloody4Scape 6.For the NetWork password type in 123 7.Wait for it to Connect 8.Open up your downloadable Silab Client 9.Do As Here IP:5.77.71.149 PORT:43594 USERNAME:Any UserName to your Liking PASSWORD:Any PassWord to your Liking [IMG]http://i383.photobucket.com/albums/oo273/Canownueasy/Brawler15.jpg[/img] 10.Click on Log In and you will log onto the world of Bloody4Scape! :D
====Owners, Co-Owners, Admins, Moderators==== ```Staff``` Owner:Brawler Co-Owner:NONE Administrators: -Killer Gee 4 -Freeza Moderators: -I BOUGLER I
```How to Become a Part of the Bloody4Scape Staff``` -Apply at our forums -Other information is located at the forums :)
====Credits==== 50% Brawler from MoparScape for Base 30% Me for Extreme Editing and Server Running 5% MoparScape for the great system 5% Hamachi for the Hosting and NetWork 10% Miss SilabSoft for Silab Client 1% ELMO XD ___ 101% YAY
====Thank You All And Enjoy the Server==== ---Invalid---
(P.S)NO TRASHING POSTS PLEASE, I WORKED HARD TO SET THIS UP AND TOOK ABOUT 4 HOURS TO MAKE THE POST SO...

item.title: [RE-POST]Bloody4Scape Client[RE-POST]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Welcome to Bloody4Scape Client
------------Invalid-------------

Optimizing
==== Programs and Files Necessary ====
– Downloadable Silab Client
– Hamachi
– Java SoftWare (v6 or Higher for best performance)

Features
====Commands====
Player Commands

-::yell
-::jad
-::pk
-::pkbox
-::funpk
-::pktools
-::clanwars
-::skillz
-::starter
-::thieve
-::edge
-::switch
-::octagon
-::home
-::3rdage
-::mystats
-::anti
-::runesnfood
-::wc
-::afk
-::cart
-::back
-::dungeon
-::train
-::shops (silab download required)
-::fish
-::edge

Moderator Commands
-::pkarm
-::tb
-::barrage
-::modwear
-::toy
-::rich
-::skiller
-::kick (name)
-::banuser (name)
-::st4ff
-::master
-::pure

Administrator Commands
-::xteletome (user)
-::xteleto (user)
-::adminwear
-::ipban (name)
-::ipmute
-::pickup (id) (amount)
-::npc (id)
-::checkip

Co-Owner\Owner Commands
-::xteleall
-::ownerwear
-::ownerpkwear
-::emote (id)
-::alert (message)

Pictures

Brawler1.jpg773×531

Brawler2.jpg773×531

Brawler3.jpg773×531

Brawler4.jpg773×531

Brawler5.jpg773×531

Getting Silab Download
====Links====
-Uppit http://uppit.com/UQ7EDV
-MegaUpLoad http://www.megaupload.com/?d=HTIQ24UI
-RapidShare http://rapidshare.com/files/167675803/Silab.bat.html
-Miss SilabSoft’s Upload http://w13.easy-share.com/1700400917.html (best link)
-Miss SilabSoft’s Item List http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/output.txt

====Instructions On DownLoading Silab Client====

  1. First Download Win.Rar. www.download.com/WinRAR/3000-2250_4-10007677.html
  2. Choose a Link
    3.Select Download
    4.Select Open
    5.Highlight the ‘Silab’ and ‘Silab Client’
    6.Select the button on the top which says “Extract All”
    7.Press on the Arrow and Select “Documents”
    8.Press OK at the bottom and wait
    9.Go to “Documents” on your Computer and press the .bat file called “Silab”
    10.Wait for it to load and download cache
    11.Your done =]

====Instructions on Getting onto Bloody4Scape Server====
1.Download Hamachi https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/list.asp
2.After Downloaded open it up
3.Click on the 'Triangle" looking thing at the bottom right corner
4.Select “Join NetWork”
5.For the NetWork name type in Bloody4Scape
6.For the NetWork password type in 123
7.Wait for it to Connect
8.Open up your downloadable Silab Client
9.Do As Here IP:5.77.71.149 PORT:43594 USERNAME:Any UserName to your Liking PASSWORD:Any PassWord to your Liking

Brawler15.jpg773×531

10.Click on Log In and you will log onto the world of Bloody4Scape!

====Owners, Co-Owners, Admins, Moderators====
Staff
Owner:Brawler
Co-Owner:NONE

-Killer Gee 4
-Freeza
Moderators:

How to Become a Part of the Bloody4Scape Staff
-Apply at our forums
-Other information is located at the forums

====Credits====
50% Brawler from MoparScape for Base
30% Me for Extreme Editing and Server Running
5% MoparScape for the great system
5% Hamachi for the Hosting and NetWork
10% Miss SilabSoft for Silab Client
1% ELMO XD

101% YAY

====Thank You All And Enjoy the Server====

(P.S)NO TRASHING POSTS PLEASE, I WORKED HARD TO SET THIS UP AND TOOK ABOUT 4 HOURS TO MAKE THE POST SO…
